title: Kanga Cricket
brief_description: An Australian Cricket Board primary development programme for kids, sponsored by the Australian Diary Corporation and supported by the Commonwealth Department of Sport, Recreation and Tourism. Demonstrates the concept of Kanga cricket, a simplified adaptation of traditional cricket rules introduced into Australian schools. Former Australian cricket captain Kim Hughes and Peter Russell-Clarke participate.
